title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, I encountered an issue where selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not work consistently. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: Close all editors, create a new file named f1.txt, and then select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. In this case, nothing happens.
